title: Department of Agriculture
name: Rahima
description: The Department of Agriculture oversees food production, farming practices, and rural development, supporting the nation's agricultural industry and sustainability.

title: Advocacy
name: subasini
description: Advocacy involves promoting causes or interests, influencing policies, and raising awareness to bring positive change or address important social issues.
